body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Roy Campbell and the customer's name is Virginia Bailey.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Roy Campbell, and I’m with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Roy, my name is Virginia Bailey. I'm looking for some information on your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Virginia! What specific information are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm curious about your latest models. I've heard good things but need to know more.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely! We have an exciting lineup. Before I delve into the details, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that! And can I also get your phone number, please? It can help us communicate more effectively.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Virginia! Our latest models include some fantastic features that I think you’ll love. Let me go over the highlights with you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Roy. I’m excited to hear more!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Virginia! If you have any more questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
